name: Too Hot For You | A real-time simulator of temperature
name_original: Too Hot For You | A real-time simulator of temperature
description:
Too Hot For You is a game about simulating real-time termperature in room. You are put in a room with bunch of tools and utilities, such as coolers or heaters. With them you can increase or decrease temperature in real time. Freely edit values in every device you install. There are also command, which can for example reset room.

This game in current state is still unfinished. I will be updating it and adding new features. Updates should be expected irregularly.

Game is available to play on web browser. There is also optional PC version in downloads (Windows Only).

Of course, comments and rates about a game are very welcome.

What I want to add in future:

  • More rooms
  • Humidity
  • More interaction with rooms
